section.title: What is New and Noteworthy in Drools 6.5.0
Configurable ThreadFactory
section.para: Some runtime environments (like for example Google App Engine) don't allow to directly create new Threads. For this reason it is now possible to plug your own ThreadFactory implementation by setting the system property drools.threadFactory with its class name.
